pid: prunus mume var.typica chinnabar purple form

basic.floral_language:
Prunus mume var.typica Chinnabar Purple Form
Floriography: pride, strong and beautiful 
Prunus mume var.typica Chinnabar Purple Form blossom proudly in the snow, with orchid, bamboo, and chrysanthemum together referred to as the "four gentlemen" in the flower. 
Leaf blade elliptic, flowers are delicate and cabinet. Color is various, petals of 5 single and double. The fragrance of plum blossom is from bitter cold, a symbol of the Chinese nation strong spiritual quality. 
Prunus mume var.typica Chinnabar Purple Form blossom like the sunshine, summer noon light should be covered. Because of the north-south differences, flowering in December to April of next year, with the ornamental period 1 to 2 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period January-February, viewing period 1-2 weeks
basic.color: Flower color white, pink, light red

display_pid: Prunus mume var.typica Chinnabar Purple Form

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Moderately resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, top-dressing before and after flowering and defoliation
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
